original: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā vaṅgīso āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhiṁ.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ āḷaviyam viharati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhi

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā vaṅgīso navako hoti acirapabbajito ohiyyako vihārapālo.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ navakaḥ hoti acira pabbajitaḥ ohiyyakaḥ vihāra pālo

original: Atha kho sambahulā itthiyo samalaṅkaritvā yena aggāḷavako ārāmo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu vihārapekkhikāyo.
analyzed: atha kho sambahulāḥ itthiyaḥ samalaṅkaritvā yena aggāḷavakaḥ ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu vihāra pekkhikāyaḥ

original: Atha kho āyasmato vaṅgīsassa tā itthiyo disvā anabhirati uppajjati, rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa tāḥ itthiyaḥ disvā anabhirati uppajjati rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti
atha kho āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa etat ahosi

original: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ;
analyzed: alābhāḥ vata me na vata me lābhāḥ dulladdham vata me na vata me su laddha

original: yassa me anabhirati uppannā, rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti, taṁ kutettha labbhā, yaṁ me paro anabhiratiṁ vinodetvā abhiratiṁ uppādeyya.
analyzed: yassa me an abhirati uppannā rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti tam kuta ittha labbhā yam me paraḥ anabhiratim vinodetvā abhiratim uppādeyya

original: Yannūnāhaṁ attanāva attano anabhiratiṁ vinodetvā abhiratiṁ uppādeyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham anabhiratim vinodetvā abhiratim uppādeyyanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso attanāva attano anabhiratiṁ vinodetvā abhiratiṁ uppādetvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai vaṅgīsaḥ anabhiratim vinodetvā abhiratim uppādetvā imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi
na me maggam pi dakkhasi iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ …pe… āyasmā vaṅgīso āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhiṁ.
analyzed: ekam samayam pe āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ āḷaviyam viharati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhi

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nigrodhakappo pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṁ pavisati, sāyaṁ vā nikkhamati aparajju vā kāle.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nigrodhakappo pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ vihāram pavisati sāyam vā nikkhamati aparajju vā kāle

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato vaṅgīsassa anabhirati uppannā hoti, rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa anabhirati uppannā hoti rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti
atha kho āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa etat ahosi

original: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ;
analyzed: alābhāḥ vata me na vata me lābhāḥ dulladdham vata me na vata me su laddha

original: yassa me anabhirati uppannā, rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti; taṁ kutettha labbhā, yaṁ me paro anabhiratiṁ vinodetvā abhiratiṁ uppādeyya.
analyzed: yassa me an abhirati uppannā rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti tam kuta ittha labbhā yam me paraḥ anabhiratim vinodetvā abhiratim uppādeyya

original: Yannūnāhaṁ attanāva attano anabhiratiṁ vinodetvā abhiratiṁ uppādeyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham anabhiratim vinodetvā abhiratim uppādeyyanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso attanāva attano anabhiratiṁ vinodetvā abhiratiṁ uppādetvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai vaṅgīsaḥ anabhiratim vinodetvā abhiratim uppādetvā imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi
nibbanathaḥ a rataḥ sa hi bhikkhu
diṭṭha sute paṭighe ca mute ca

original: Yo ettha na limpati taṁ munimāhu.
analyzed: yaḥ ettha na limpati tam munim āhu
no pana duṭṭhulla bhāṇī sa bhikkhu

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā vaṅgīso āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhiṁ.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ āḷaviyam viharati aggāḷave cetiye āyasmatā nigrodhakappena upajjhāyena saddhi

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā vaṅgīso attano paṭibhānena aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ attanaḥ paṭibhānena aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati
atha kho āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa etat ahosi

original: “alābhā vata me, na vata me lābhā; dulladdhaṁ vata me, na vata me suladdhaṁ;
analyzed: alābhāḥ vata me na vata me lābhāḥ dulladdham vata me na vata me su laddha

original: yvāhaṁ attano paṭibhānena aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññāmī”ti.
analyzed: yvā aham attanaḥ paṭibhānena aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññāmi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso attanāva attano vippaṭisāraṁ uppādetvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imā gāthāyo abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai vaṅgīsaḥ attanāva attano vippaṭisāram uppādetvā imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsi
dhamma daso ti tam āhu pahitatta

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmai ānandaḥ sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi āyasmatā vaṅgīsena pacchāsamaṇena.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmatā ānandaḥ pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisi āyasmatā vaṅgīsena pacchāsamaṇena

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato vaṅgīsassa anabhirati uppannā hoti, rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa anabhirati uppannā hoti rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ āyasmantam ānandam gāthāya ajjhabhāsi

original: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā; anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṁ.
analyzed: catūhi bhikkhave aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā su bhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu subhāsitaṁyeva bhāsati no dubbhāsitaṁ, dhammaṁyeva bhāsati no adhammaṁ, piyaṁyeva bhāsati no appiyaṁ, saccaṁyeva bhāsati no alikaṁ.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu su bhāsitayā iva bhāsati no dubbhāsita dhammayā iva bhāsati no adhamma piyayā iva bhāsati no appiya saccayā iva bhāsati no alika

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hoti, no dubbhāsitā, anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnan”ti.
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā su bhāsitā hoti no dubbhāsitā anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnanti

original: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
analyzed: idam vatvāna sugataḥ atha aparam etat avoca satthā
dhammam bhaṇe na adhammam tam dutiya
piyam bhaṇe na appiyam tam tatiya
saccam bhaṇe nālikam tam catuttham ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca
paṭibhāti ma bhagavā paṭibhāti ma sugata ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavantaṁ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ bhagavantam sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmā sāriputto sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaseti poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā

original: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṁ suṇanti.
analyzed: te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhim katvā manasi katvā sabba cetasā samannāharitvā ohita sotāḥ dhammam suṇanti
atha kho āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa etat ahosi

original: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā.
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaseti poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā

original: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṁ suṇanti.
analyzed: te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhim katvā manasi katvā sabba cetasā samannāharitvā ohita sotāḥ dhammam suṇanti

original: Yannūnāhaṁ āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham āyasmantam sāriputtam sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yenāyasmā sāriputto tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena āyasmā sāriputto tena añjalim paṇāmetvā āyasmantam sāriputtam etat avoca

original: “paṭibhāti maṁ, āvuso sāriputta, paṭibhāti maṁ, āvuso sāriputtā”ti.
analyzed: paṭibhāti me āvuso sāriputta paṭibhāti me āvuso sāriputta ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ āyasmantam sāriputtam sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati pubbārāme migāra mātupāsāde mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim pañcamattehi bhikkhu satehi sabbehi eva arahantehi

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya bhikkhu saṅgha parivutaḥ abbhokāse nisinnaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtam bhikkhu saṅgham anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: Na ca me kiñci garahatha kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā”ti.
analyzed: na ca me kiñci garahatha kāyikam vā vācasikam vā ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā sāriputtaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “na kho mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavato kiñci garahāma kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā.
analyzed: na kho bhante bhagavato kiñci garahāma kāyikam vā vācasikam vā

original: Bhagavā hi, bhante, anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū maggavidū maggakovido.
analyzed: bhagavā hi bhante anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā a sañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā an akkhātassa maggassa akkhātā maggaññū magga vidū magga kovidaḥ

original: Maggānugā ca, bhante, etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā;
analyzed: magga anugā ca bhante etarahi sāvakāḥ viharanti pacchā samannāgatā
aham ca kho bhante bhagavantam pavāremi

original: Na ca me bhagavā kiñci garahati kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā”ti.
analyzed: na ca me bhagavā kiñci garahati kāyikam vā vācasikam vā ati

original: “Na khvāhaṁ te, sāriputta, kiñci garahāmi kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā.
analyzed: na khvā aham te sāriputta kiñci garahāmi kāyikam vā vācasikam vā

original: Paṇḍito tvaṁ, sāriputta, mahāpañño tvaṁ, sāriputta, puthupañño tvaṁ, sāriputta, hāsapañño
analyzed: paṇḍito tva sāriputta mahā paññaḥ tva sāriputta puthu paññaḥ tva sāriputta hāsa pañño

original: tvaṁ, sāriputta, javanapañño tvaṁ, sāriputta, tikkhapañño tvaṁ, sāriputta, nibbedhikapañño tvaṁ, sāriputta.
analyzed: tva sāriputta javana paññaḥ tva sāriputta tikkha paññaḥ tva sāriputta nibbedhika paññaḥ tva sāriputta

original: Seyyathāpi, sāriputta, rañño cakkavattissa jeṭṭhaputto pitarā pavattitaṁ cakkaṁ sammadeva anuppavatteti;
analyzed: seyyathā api sāriputta raññaḥ cakkavattissa jeṭṭha puttaḥ pitarā pavattitam cakkam sammat eva anuppavatteti

original: evameva kho tvaṁ, sāriputta, mayā anuttaraṁ dhammacakkaṁ pavattitaṁ sammadeva anuppavattesī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho tva sāriputta mayā anuttaram dhammacakkam pavattitam sammat eva anuppavattesi iti

original: “No ce kira me, bhante, bhagavā kiñci garahati kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā.
analyzed: no ce kira me bhante bhagavā kiñci garahati kāyikam vā vācasikam vā

original: Imesaṁ pana, bhante, bhagavā pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ na kiñci garahati kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā”ti.
analyzed: imesam pana bhante bhagavā pañcannam bhikkhu satānam na kiñci garahati kāyikam vā vācasikam vā ati

original: “Imesampi khvāhaṁ, sāriputta, pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ na kiñci garahāmi kāyikaṁ vā vācasikaṁ vā.
analyzed: imesam pi khvā āha sāriputta pañcannam bhikkhu satānam na kiñci garahāmi kāyikam vā vācasikam vā

original: Imesañhi, sāriputta, pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ saṭṭhi bhikkhū tevijjā, saṭṭhi bhikkhū chaḷabhiññā, saṭṭhi bhikkhū ubhatobhāgavimuttā, atha itare paññāvimuttā”ti.
analyzed: imesam hi sāriputta pañcannam bhikkhu satānam saṭṭhi bhikkhū tevijjā saṭṭhi bhikkhū chaḷabhiññā saṭṭhi bhikkhū ubhatobhāga vimuttā atha itare paññā vimuttā ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca
paṭibhāti ma bhagavā paṭibhāti ma sugata ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavantaṁ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ bhagavantam sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhusatehi.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim aḍḍhatelasehi bhikkhu satehi

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbānapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbāna paṭisayuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaseti

original: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṁ suṇanti.
analyzed: te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhim katvā manasi katvā sabba cetasā samannāharitvā ohita sotāḥ dhammam suṇanti
atha kho āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa etat ahosi

original: “ayaṁ kho bhagavā bhikkhū nibbānapaṭisaṁyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.
analyzed: ayam kho bhagavā bhikkhū nibbāna paṭisayuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaseti

original: Te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṁ suṇanti.
analyzed: te ca bhikkhū aṭṭhim katvā manasi katvā sabba cetasā samannāharitvā ohita sotāḥ dhammam suṇanti

original: Yannūnāhaṁ bhagavantaṁ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham bhagavantam sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca
paṭibhāti ma bhagavā paṭibhāti ma sugata ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavantaṁ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ bhagavantam sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi

original: “Kiṁ nu te, vaṅgīsa, imā gāthāyo pubbe parivitakkitā, udāhu ṭhānasova taṁ paṭibhantī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu te vaṅgīse imāḥ gāthāyaḥ pubbe parivitakkitāḥ udāhu ṭhānasā uva tam paṭibhanti iti

original: “Na kho me, bhante, imā gāthāyo pubbe parivitakkitā, atha kho ṭhānasova maṁ paṭibhantī”ti.
analyzed: na kho me bhante imāḥ gāthāyaḥ pubbe parivitakkitāḥ atha kho ṭhānasā uva mama paṭibhanti iti

original: “Tena hi taṁ, vaṅgīsa, bhiyyoso mattāya pubbe aparivitakkitā gāthāyo paṭibhantū”ti.
analyzed: tena hi ta vaṅgīsa bhiyyosaḥ mattāya pubbe a parivitakkitāḥ gāthāyaḥ paṭibhantu uti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā vaṅgīso bhagavato paṭissutvā bhiyyoso mattāya bhagavantaṁ pubbe aparivitakkitāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ bhagavato paṭissutvā bhiyyosaḥ mattāya bhagavantam pubbe a parivitakkitāhi gāthāhi

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Atha kho āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍañño sucirasseva yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai aññāsi koṇḍaññaḥ su cirassa iva yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavataḥ pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati
ca parisambāhati nāman ca sāva iti
koṇḍaññā uha bhagavā koṇḍaññā uha sugatā iti
atha kho āyasmataḥ vaṅgīsassa etat ahosi

original: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍañño sucirasseva yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: ayam kho āyasmai aññāsikoṇḍaññaḥ su cirassa iva yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavataḥ pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati
ca parisambāhati nāman ca sāva iti
koṇḍaññā uha bhagavā koṇḍaññā uha sugatā iti

original: Yannūnāhaṁ āyasmantaṁ aññāsikoṇḍaññaṁ bhagavato sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthaveyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham āyasmantam aññāsikoṇḍañam bhagavatoḥ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā bhagavantam etat avoca
paṭibhāti ma bhagavā paṭibhāti ma sugata ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīso āyasmantaṁ aññāsikoṇḍaññaṁ bhagavato sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi abhitthavi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaṅgīsaḥ āyasmantam aññāsikoṇḍaññam bhagavatoḥ sammukhā sāruppāhi gāthāhi

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati isigilipasse kāḷasilāyaṁ mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati isigili passe kāḷasilāyam mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena saddhim pañcamattehi bhikkhu satehi sabbehi eva arahantehi

original: Tesaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno cetasā cittaṁ samannesati vippamuttaṁ nirupadhiṁ.
analyzed: tesam sudam āyasmā mahāmoggallāno cetasā cittam samannesati vippamuttam nirupadhi

analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā campāyam viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre mahatā bhikkhu saṅghena
